SEARCH
Package io.goobi.viewer.controller.config.filter

Class PassedValueFilter

java.lang.Object
io.goobi.viewer.controller.config.filter.AbstractFilterConfiguration
io.goobi.viewer.controller.config.filter.PassedValueFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IFilterConfiguration
public final class PassedValueFilter extends AbstractFilterConfiguration
A configurable filter allowing passage to document entities (record, docStruct, page) which satisfy certain conditions. The filter itself may contain condition filters which determine if the filter should be applied to an entity

      a new PassedValueFilter

    • passes

      public boolean passes(String value, VariableReplacer vr)
      This is the main method to apply the filter. It first checks if the conditions apply. If they don't, true is always returned. Otherwise, it returns true if action is FilterAction.SHOW and matches(String value, VariableReplacer) returns true, or if action is FilterAction.HIDE and matches(String value, VariableReplacer) returns false. In all other cases, it returns false
      Parameters:
      value - the value to test. May contain VariableReplacer expressions
      vr - a variable replacer containing values to test
      Returns:
      whether conditions apply and the object represented by the variable replacer passes the filter

      Returns:
